block.p: RABENOU-Elsa. Passed away at Lenox Hill Hospital in Manhattan on August 1 at the age of 90. Widow of prominent art dealer Khalil Rabenou and loving mother of Esther Mahboubian, Yris Solomon, Parviz Rabenou and grandmother of seven grandsons and three great-grandchildren. Service will be held Thursday, August 3, 2000, 11:30AM at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue, New York City. Interment will follow at Cedar Park Cemetery in Emerson, N.J.
